file_content.text: Outsider. Rest, take shelter, return home. Only Gormak territory lays beyond.
Good luck.
I'm looking for a woman. Another outsider. She was headed for Gorma-Koss.
Then I'm going the right way.
She has found it. An outsider woman fell victim to Gormak attack.
Thanks, but trespassing comes with the job.
I'm prepared for trouble.
That supposed to mean something to me?
What's your point?
Gormak are savages. Their purpose is only to kill.
One outsider has already been taken by the Gormak today.
This outsider happen to be a human female?
Was it a woman?
Yes. It was.
Doesn't seem like you get a lot of traffic out here.
That a common occurrence?
We do not. This was unusual.
The day I need you grunts to get me out of a bind is the day I chuck my blaster.
Spare me the warnings.
The outsider woman also was fearless.
The Gormak attacked. She surrendered.
How'd that work out for her?
She still alive?
She was made captive.
She wasn't looking for a fight.
That makes sense.
Normally the enemy knows only murder.
She was delivering secrets to the Gormak.
I can explain. She's a spy.
Truthfully?
Of course she did. They sent her to kill Dokath-Ra.
I can explain. She's a spy.
The Gormak are beasts. They do not plot.
If this is true, her treason will be appropriately rewarded.
The woman was taken towards the Gormak beast pens. Her fate is sealed.
Show me where they took her.
Point the way.
Can't wait to see the look on her face when I pull her rear out of the fire.
Bet she wasn't expecting this.
If I wanted to find what's left of her, where would I go?
I can't go back empty-handed.
It's my job to make sure she's dealt with.
I can't leave that to chance.
Let's make sure the Gormak take good care of her. Where should I go?
I'd like a front row seat.
I'm not gonna let them hog all the fun.
I'll see that she pays.
I will point out the place.
If she is a traitor, she deserves her death.
Be cautious.
You enter Gormak lands. Be mindful.
